Faculty Portal¶

Module¶

class module.Module()¶

Root element that loads all module-related data

Main placeholder for all faculty-related data.

module.Module.module.Module.methods.updateModuleInfo()¶

Get the title of the module, given it’s code Called when first created, and then whenever the route changes.

ModuleDemographics¶

class module.ModuleDemographics()¶

Loaded by the Demographics tab.

Pulls data from the /backend/faculty/demographics/ endpoint.

Calls barChart(),:js:func:scatterChart and donutChart()

module.ModuleDemographics.ModuleDemographics.methods.updateChart(chart, data)¶

Update the charts at a given div

Arguments:
  • chart (string) –
  • data (string) – for the charts
module.ModuleDemographics.ModuleDemographics.methods.showStudents(students)¶

Drilldown function to show more information on the students div

Arguments:
  • students (list) – list shows the student modal

ModuleAcademics¶

class module.ModuleAcademics()¶

Loaded by the Academic tab.

Pulls data from the /backend/faculty/academics/byfac endpoint.

Calls barChart() and scatterChart()

module.ModuleAcademics.ModuleAcademics.methods.showStudents(students)¶

Drilldown function to show more information on the students div

Arguments:
  • students (list) – list shows the student modal
module.ModuleAcademics.ModuleAcademics.methods.updatePrereqsTags(prerequisites)¶

Update any prerequisites tags at a given div

Arguments:
  • prerequisites (list) – list Also updates the tooltip that display the Prerequisites Tags
module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updateCurrentGrades()¶

Update Current Grades of Student for particular module

add Current Grades data to be displayed on the charts

addtooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updatePastGrades()¶

Update Past Grades of Student for particular module

add Past Grades data to be displayed on the charts

add tooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updateSemesterWorkload()¶

Update Semester Workload of Student for particular module

add Semester Workload data to be displayed on the charts

add tooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updatePredictedStudents()¶

Update Predicted Students for particular module

add Predicted Students data to be displayed on the charts

add tooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updateAttnWeb()¶

Update Attendance and Webcast Rates of Student for particular module

add Attendance and Webcast Rates data to be displayed on the charts

add tooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.updatePrereqCharts()¶

Update Prerequisites of Student for particular module

add Prerequisites data to be displayed on the charts

add tooltip Data to display as tooltips in chart function

module.ModuleAcademics.module.ModuleAcademics.methods.buildCharts()¶

Build All the Charts for Academics Dashboard using barChart() and scatterChart()

ModuleEnrolment¶

class module.ModuleEnrolment()¶

Loaded by the Enrolment tab.

Pulls data from the /backend/faculty/enrolment/ endpoint.

Display the module enrolment table, the student modal

Charts¶

barChart(id, colour, labels, tooltipData)¶

Creates a bar chart at a given div

Arguments:
  • id (string) – HTML id of div to place chart in
  • colour (string) – Colour of bar chart columns
  • labels (list) – X axis labels (optional)
  • tooltipData (list) – Data to display as tooltips
scatterChart(id, colour, xLabel, yLabel, tooltipData)¶

Creates a scatter plot at a given div

Arguments:
  • id (string) – HTML id of div to place chart in
  • colour (string) – Colour of points in plot
  • xLabel (string) – Label of x axis
  • yLabel (string) – Label of y axis
  • tooltipData (list) – Data to display as tooltips
donutChart(id, labels)¶

Creates a donut chart at a given div

Arguments:
  • id (string) – HTML id of div to place chart in
  • labels (list) – (optional)
